summary: WHILE TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY AND WITHOUT PRIOR WARNING, THE  WINDSHIELD WIPERS STOPPED WHILE IN USE.    *AK. THE WIPER MOTOR WAS REPLACED UNDER RECALL PREVIOUSLY, HOWEVER  THE SECOND TIME THE COVER AND SWITCH ASSEMBLY WAS REPLACED AT THE CONSUMER EXPENSE. ALSO THE PINION SEAL WAS REPLACED DUE TO A LEAK.   PH   *JB
